Boingy Beach.title: Strange Lights Over Boingy Beach
Boingy Beach.description: You didn't hear this from me, but three people swear they saw glowing orbs dancing over Boingy Beach last Tuesday night. One claims they heard giggling. Could be fairy lights, could be something weird...

Giggle Hillock.title: The Case of the Disappearing Garden Gnomes
Giggle Hillock.description: Between you and me, seventeen garden gnomes have vanished from Giggle Hillock in the past week. Not stolen - they're just GONE. No footprints, no broken ceramic, nothing. Gary Tiddlestack claims he sa...
